Description: A fungal disease that causes orange or yellow spots on leaves.
Why it occurred: Caused by the fungus Puccinia sorghi.
Prevention measures: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overwatering, and thin plants to allow for good air circulation.
Recommended steps to cure the disease: Apply a fungicide such as propiconazole or triadimefon.
